overview:
Tony Faure is an investor in growing digital media and marketing companies, a digital strategy advisor and well regarded speaker on the future of media and marketing. His passion is helping entrepreneurs create great digital businesses.

He began his career in publishing technology magazines in then UK. Focusing on sales, marketing, editorial and circulation. After moving to Australia he founded Yahoo! Australia & NZ, and went on to become the Regional VP, South Asia for Yahoo! and eventually, CEO of ninemsn for two years.

Tony is a chairman at both Lasttix.com.au and Torque as well as a non-executive director at Business Spectator/Eureka Report.
